Magarena 1.26, Debian Linux (Wheezy)

I'm not sure how to reproduce it, but you can see the table and the game log in pictures.

Hunting Moa makes the caster put a +1/+1 counter on the target creature as it enters the game. AI chose my creature, despite having more than enough targets of its own !
author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)
title: AI buffs my creature with Hunting Moa
content:
_From [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/) on June 25, 2012 15:08:27_

Magarena 1.26, Debian Linux (Wheezy)

I'm not sure how to reproduce it, but you can see the table and the game log in pictures.

Hunting Moa makes the caster put a +1/+1 counter on the target creature as it enters the game. AI chose my creature, despite having more than enough targets of its own !
